scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -target MatrixFilterConstructor -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator clean
scripts.infer:ios: cd ios && infer run -- xcodebuild -project MatrixFilterConstructor.xcodeproj -configuration Debug -scheme MatrixFilterConstructor -sdk iphonesimulator COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO
scripts.infer:alt-ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -target MatrixFilterConstructor -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO | tee xcodebuild.log && xcpretty -r json-compilation-database -o compile_commands.json < xcodebuild.log > /dev/null && infer run --compilation-database-escaped compile_commands.json
scripts.start: rm -rf out && cd src && dotnet fable npm-run watch
